resources.string:
In this tab you are able to give the patient an identity.
You will have to enter the respective blood count and current medication.
After that you can get the result of the blood count by pushing the Result button in the fourth tab. 

Do you want to see the instruction on the next start again?

In this tab you are able to add new diseases to the database. Therefor all you have to do is to enter the disease\'s name, threshold values of the respective blood values and a recommended medication for the disease. After you have to push the Save button at the bottom of the fourth tab. \n\nDo you want to see the instruction on the next start again?

In this tab you are able to enter new medication interactions to the database. Therefor you just have to enter the respective names, type of interaction and push the button on the bottom. \n\nDo you want to see the instruction on the next start again?
The RheinMain University of Applied Sciences was founded in 1971.\n With more than 12,000 students it is one of the bigger universities in Germany.
This app was created as part of a bachelor thesis. Every diagnosis is only a suggestion and does not have to right.
If you find any bugs, mistakes or have suggestions to make the app more efficient, feel free to send an email.\nWe are really looking forward to get your feedback.

This tab is about the project. If you find any bugs, feel free to send an email. For that you just have to push the button on the bottom. \n\nDo you want to see the instruction on the next start again?
In this tab you can see every patient\'s chart. You just have to enter the respective id and push the button. \n\nDo you want to see the instruction on the next start again?
